user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Initialization and Requirement Discovery
epics.summary: Set up the project and identify all requirements
epics.description: Initiate the project by establishing goals, identifying stakeholders, and documenting use case requirements. Define the technical stack, environment setup, and delivery roadmap to guide product development effectively.

epics.title: User Account Setup and Authentication
epics.summary: Allow users to create and securely access accounts
epics.description: Develop registration, login, password management, and authentication flows. Implement encryption, token management, and access control to ensure data privacy and a secure login experience for all users.

epics.title: Core Use Case Functionality Implementation
epics.summary: Build the main features that realize the use case objective
epics.description: Develop backend and frontend components to deliver the core functional value of the project. Define user interactions, business rules, and workflows that enable the system to perform its primary purpose accurately and efficiently.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Design
epics.description: Craft intuitive, accessible, and responsive interfaces ensuring that users can interact effectively with system features. Incorporate design standards, usability testing, and feedback iterations to achieve a cohesive and engaging user journey.

epics.title: Integration and Feature Extensions
epics.summary: Enhance the system with external integrations
epics.description: Integrate external services such as third-party APIs, analytics tools, or notification systems to improve the platformâ€™s capabilities. Add advanced, value-driven features that extend the usefulness of the core functionality.

epics.title: Testing, Quality Assurance, and Refinement
epics.summary: Validate quality and refine features through testing
epics.description: Perform comprehensive testing activities including unit, integration, and acceptance testing to ensure reliability and performance. Refine the product based on identified issues and ensure it meets all defined business and technical requirements.

epics.title: Deployment and Release Execution
epics.summary: Deploy the finalized product into production environments
epics.description: Prepare deployment architecture, set up automated CI/CD pipelines, and manage release processes. Execute a stable deployment strategy with monitoring and rollback mechanisms to secure a smooth production release.

epics.title: Monitoring, Feedback, and Continuous Improvements
epics.summary: Monitor performance and evolve the product post-launch
epics.description: Monitor product health, gather real-time analytics, and collect user feedback. Continuously enhance functionality, fix emerging issues, and plan new iterations to align the solution with evolving business goals and user expectations.

user_stories.title: Initiate Project Goals and Stakeholder Identification
user_stories.description: As a project manager, I want to establish the project's goals and identify all stakeholders, so that everyone involved is aligned on the objectives and responsibilities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Clearly defined project goals; Complete list of stakeholders.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the kick-off meeting, When stakeholders are identified, Then the project goals must be documented and agreed upon.

user_stories.title: Document Use Case Requirements
user_stories.description: As a business analyst, I want to document all use case requirements, so that we have a clear understanding of what needs to be built.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Requirements should be specific, measurable, and testable.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Complete and clear documentation of all use case requirements.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the requirement gathering process, When use cases are identified, Then the requirements must be documented clearly.

user_stories.title: Develop User Registration Flow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to register an account, so that I can create a profile and access the system.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can register with email verification.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the registration page, When the user submits their details, Then the system should send a verification email and create an account upon verification.

user_stories.title: Implement Secure Login Flow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to securely log in to my account, so that my data remains private and protected.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can log in securely with token-based authentication.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the login page, When the user inputs correct credentials, Then the system should authenticate and generate a session token.

user_stories.title: Implement Password Management
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to reset my password, so that I can regain access to my account if I forget it.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Password reset should require email verification.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can reset their password with email verification.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the forgot password page, When the user submits a request, Then the system should send a password reset email and allow the user to set a new password.

user_stories.title: Develop Backend Components
user_stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to build the backend components, so that the system can process data and execute business logic.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Follow defined business rules and integrate with the database.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Backend components are developed and integrated with the database.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the backend architecture, When business logic is executed, Then the data should be stored and processed correctly.

user_stories.title: Develop Frontend Components
user_stories.description: As a frontend developer, I want to build the frontend components, so that users can interact with the system's features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure a responsive and user-friendly interface.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Frontend components are developed and provide a user-friendly interface.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the frontend architecture, When user interactions occur, Then the system should respond accurately and efficiently.

user_stories.title: Define User Interactions and Workflows
user_stories.description: As a UX designer, I want to define user interactions and workflows, so that the system supports the primary purpose effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows should be optimized for usability and efficiency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User interactions and workflows are defined and optimized.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the interaction design, When users follow workflows, Then the experience should be seamless and intuitive.

user_stories.title: Design Intuitive User Interfaces
user_stories.description: As a UI designer, I want to design intuitive user interfaces, so that users can interact effectively with system features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interfaces should be accessible and responsive.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User interfaces are intuitive, accessible, and responsive.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the design specifications, When interfaces are built, Then users should be able to complete tasks with ease.

user_stories.title: Conduct Usability Testing
user_stories.description: As a UX researcher, I want to conduct usability testing, so that the design meets user needs and preferences.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Testing should involve feedback from a diverse user group.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Usability testing is conducted and feedback is documented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user testing session, When users interact with the system, Then feedback should be collected and analyzed.

user_stories.title: Integrate Third-Party APIs
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate third-party APIs, so that the platform's capabilities are enhanced.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure secure and reliable API integrations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Third-party APIs are integrated and functioning correctly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given API documentation, When integration is complete, Then the system should interact with third-party services reliably.

user_stories.title: Add Advanced Features
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to add advanced features, so that the core functionality is extended and provides more value.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Features should be driven by user feedback and market demand.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Advanced features are developed and deployed successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given new feature requirements, When development is finished, Then the features should enhance the core functionality meaningfully.

user_stories.title: Conduct Unit and Integration Testing
user_stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to perform unit and integration testing, so that reliability and performance are ensured.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Testing should cover all critical components and interactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Comprehensive testing is completed with high coverage.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the test cases, When testing is executed, Then all tests should pass without issues.

user_stories.title: Refine Product Based on Testing
user_stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to refine the product based on test results, so that all issues are addressed and requirements are met.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Refinement should focus on identified issues.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All identified issues are resolved and the product meets requirements.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the test results, When issues are resolved, Then the product should meet all requirements and function smoothly.

user_stories.title: Prepare Deployment Architecture
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to prepare the deployment architecture, so that the product can be deployed smoothly and reliably.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Deployment architecture is set up and validated.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the deployment plan, When architecture is set up, Then it should support scalable and fault-tolerant deployments.

user_stories.title: Execute Stable Release Process
user_stories.description: As a release manager, I want to execute a stable release process, so that the product is deployed to production smoothly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Release is executed with monitoring and rollback mechanisms in place.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the release process, When deployment is executed, Then the product should be monitored and have rollback options.

user_stories.title: Monitor Product Health
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to monitor product health, so that I am aware of its performance and any issues.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the monitoring tools, When the product is live, Then health metrics should be collected and reported in real-time.

user_stories.title: Collect User Feedback
user_stories.description: As a UX researcher, I want to collect user feedback, so that we can make data-driven improvements to the product.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User feedback is collected and analyzed regularly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the feedback mechanisms, When users interact with the product, Then feedback should be solicited and documented.

user_stories.title: Plan New Iterations Based on Feedback
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to plan new iterations based on user feedback, so that the product continuously evolves and improves.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Align iterations with business goals and user needs.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: New iterations are planned and aligned with feedback and goals.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the collected feedback, When planning new iterations, Then the product should continuously evolve based on user needs and business goals.
